metadata.title: CVE-2020-16121 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
PackageKit provided detailed error messages to unprivileged callers thatexposed information about file presence and mimetype of files that the userwould be unable to determine on its own.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16121` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-packagekitglib-1.0 - 1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1
gstreamer1.0-packagekit - 1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1
libpackagekit-glib2-18 - 1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1
packagekit - 1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1
packagekit-command-not-found - 1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1
packagekit-gtk3-module - 1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1
packagekit-tools - 1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: packagekit package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.13-2ubuntu1.1').
